about_the_game: Experience the unique action-match3/rpg game with 3 solo Stages from the first Campaign, plus 1 Coop Scenario.
detailed_description: Experience the unique action-match3/rpg game with 3 solo Stages from the first Campaign, plus 1 Coop Scenario.
name: CrossOver: Roll For Initiative Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 980 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: 2 solo Stages from the first Campaign, plus 1 Coop Scenario.
